name: Super Pentagon (Winged)
description:
Super Pentagon

Avoid incoming obstacles by moving left or right. Survive for as long as you can. Unlock new levels by surviving longer than 50 seconds on previous ones.

Controls

arrow keys / WSADnavigate menus / move player left-rightspace / enter / Xselect / accept / retryescape / backspace / Cback

Credits

This is a fangame based on original game Super Hexagon by Terry Cavanagh. Be sure to give the original game a spin!

Made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3.

Made with Godot Engine 3.2.3.

Horrible music by me, using Nokia 3310 Composer for Kontakt VST.

Font: CG Pixel 3x5 Mono.
